players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is dead, so we have one mafia among us. Let's share our thoughts and votes carefully."
Bob: "Charlie is the mafia. I investigated him last night and found out."
Charlie: "Bob is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she's a villager. Bob must be mafia trying to frame me."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective, and I investigated him. He is the mafia. Alice, believe me."
You: "I believe Bob is the detective. Charlie's claim doesn't add up - why investigate a villager when we have limited time to find mafia?"
Charlie: "Alice, if Bob were detective, why did he investigate me instead of Diana? He'd have known Diana was town and could have cleared her. He's lying to mislead you."
